Description: You are bidding on a as new, authentic, Hamilton Dodson Swiss Automatic with papers, case measures 36mm, circa 2010s, ref. H27415733. The case of the watch is clean with minor signs of wear. Looking closely to the back case you may notice some small scratches, but nothing too obvious and not affect the overall aspect of the watch. The crystal is clean and without scratches. The watch comes with used (minor signs) Hamilton leather band and folding clasp. The watch was not tested on water resistance. Technically the watch is in excellent condition. The movement is ETA 2895-2. Everything works without issues. Please consider the pictures as a part of the description, please. If you have any concerns, contact me so I could answer all your questions. I truly believe that it’s better to clarify everything before bidding in order not be disappointed after receiving the watch.The watch is guaranteed 100% authentic or your full money back. Payment & Shipping We accept PayPal payment only. Ships via EMS to Worldwide (40$). Only for European Union countries will be shipped via DHL - 40$ (up 3 working days to your door). Sorry for hight cost of shipping but i prefer the DHL for expensive watches becuase it is very safety and fast, with minimal risk. No taxes for European Union countries. All the customs charges and taxes are under buyer’s responsibility, but under buyer request can assist to exclude any of this. The durations of shipping for European Union are just estimate in 2-3 business days, for USA in 5-10 business days, rest of the world 10-14 working days. It may take longer depending on location, custom clearance and traffic condition.Please contact us first if you have any problems with your purchase before opening a case. We will solve the problem immediately. Returns Accepted depends on case, if it is our fault we will full refund you.
Title: HAMILTON Dodson ref. H27415733 Swiss Automatic ETA 2895-2 with Papers

ReturnPolicy.Description:
I return the money in the following conditions: 
The packet didn't go to the destination; 
I return the whole account of money, after the post office makes the necessary research and finds out that the packet has been lost.
In other situations: I will try to propose acceptable conditions for both.
